DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and blood pressure lowering effect of different doses of PF-00489791 in patients with mild to moderate high blood pressure
DOC.brief_title: A Dose Finding Study Of PF-00489791 In Patients With Mild To Moderate High Blood Pressure
DOC.criteria: 1. Males and/or Females of nonchildbearing potential between 18 and 70 years of age 2. History of mild to moderate hypertension 1. Type 1 or 2 diabetes on prescribed medications 2. Secondary, severe, or malignant hypertension 3. History of a significant cardiovascular event within the last 12 months of enrollment
DOC.keyword: Clinical Trial, Randomized Controlled Trial, Humans, Cyclic Nucleotide Phosphodiesterases Type 5
